Message.Text: Welcome to Mark's Unturned Pure PvP Server, we hope you enjoy your stay!
Welcome to Mark's Unturned Pure PvP Server, we hope you enjoy your stay!
You're now playing on Pure PvP server. Beware of your surroundings.
Please chat in English or any other Asian language. Also, be polite.
This server will shutdown everyday @ 10:00 PM. Be sure to stay away from the zombies.
If you have any questions, ask an admin on our Steam Group.
